mapper.update:
update app_update_config
app_version = #{appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_type = #{appType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_url = #{appUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update app_update_config set app_version = #{appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_type = #{appType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_url = #{appUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, force_type = #{forceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deal_flag = #{dealFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, app_version, app_type, content, app_url, force_type,deal_flag,remark from app_update_config config where config.deal_flag = 'n' and config.app_type = #{appType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY config.app_version DESC
